main event: On July 17th, 1958, a bright, star-like object was sighted as motionless due east of Miami.
interesting points: The object was described as very brilliant and 20-30 times the size of a star.
It appeared motionless and slowly disappeared without shooting or moving.
The sighting was reported by Miami Police Sgt. Regan at 0945Z.
The report was also delivered to various Air Force and Coast Guard departments for action.
No photographs were taken of the object during the sighting.
